a list of int-checker functions separated by ','. Write the checks as if you were writing code. The functions recognised are:

    int-checker functions:
        And(..., int-checker)
        Between(int, int)
        Divides(int)
        EQ(int)
        GE(int)
        GT(int)
        IsAMultiple(int)
        LE(int)
        LT(int)
        Not(int-checker, string)
        OK()
        Or(..., int-checker)
